'''Never-Ending Performance''' is [[Kaeya]]'s Level 2 [[Constellation]].

== Gameplay Notes ==

* This constellation can extend [[Glacial Waltz]]'s duration for an additional '''7''' seconds. (max '''15''' seconds)
* A total of '''3''' enemies needed to be defeated while Glacial Waltz is in effect to get the max duration increased. ('''2.5''' seconds/enemy)
